member.name: T:Travel.Common.BlankLibrary
member.summary:
CCC: Library class of methods to work with Blank (Empty String, Nothing or DBNull) values.
Using the shared methods from this class will typically save you a line or 2 of code especially when working with values where you don't care about the difference between "" (Empty String), Nothing (null) and DBNull.Value.

member.name: M:Travel.Common.BlankLibrary.IsBlank(System.Object)
member.summary: CCC: Function looks to see if value is blank (DBNull, Nothing and "" all equate to blank)
member.remarks: NOTE: From the users perspective, DBNull, Nothing and "" are all the same when displayed in a textbox!

member.name: M:Travel.Common.BlankLibrary.IsBlankIgnoreSpaces(System.Object)
member.summary: CCC: Function looks to see if value is blank (DBNull, Nothing, "" and " " all equate to blank)
member.remarks: NOTE: From the users perspective, DBNull, Nothing and "" are all the same when displayed in a textbox! This function counts spaces as blank when doing the check

member.name: M:Travel.Common.BlankLibrary.NoBlank(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: CCC: If Value is Blank (Nothing or "") then return ValueIfBlank, otherwise return Value
member.remarks: NOTE: A Bit like NZ from VBA or IsNull from SQL

member.name: M:Travel.Common.BlankLibrary.NoBlank(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: CCC: If Value is Blank (Nothing or "") then return ValueIfBlank, otherwise return Value
member.remarks: NOTE: A Bit like NZ from VBA or IsNull from SQL

member.name: M:Travel.Common.BlankLibrary.NoNull(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: CCC: If Value is Null (Nothing or DBNull) then return ValueIfNull, otherwise return Value

member.name: M:Travel.Common.BlankLibrary.NoNull(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: CCC: If Value is Null (Nothing or DBNull) then return ValueIfDBNull, otherwise return Value

member.name: M:Travel.Common.BlankLibrary.IsNull(System.Object)
member.summary: CCC: Return whether value is Null (Nothing or DBNull)

member.name: P:Travel.Common.EnvironmentLibrary.ApplicationVirtualPath
member.summary: CCC: Returns the root directory of the website e.g. '/MyWebSite'

member.name: P:Travel.Common.EnvironmentLibrary.ApplicationRoot
member.summary: CCC: Returns the root directory of the website without the forward slash eg 'MyWebSite'

member.name: P:Travel.Common.EnvironmentLibrary.ApplicationPhysicalPath
member.summary: CCC: Returns the file path of the root directory of the website e.g. 'C:\inetpub\wwwroot\MyWebSite'

member.name: P:Travel.Common.EnvironmentLibrary.IISVersion
member.summary: CCC: Returns the version of IIS in which the application is hosted

member.name: P:Travel.Common.EnvironmentLibrary.PageName
member.summary: CCC: Returns the page name from the file path e.g. 'MyPage.aspx'

member.name: P:Travel.Common.EnvironmentLibrary.PageNameWithoutExtension
member.summary: CCC: Returns the current page name without the ".aspx"

member.name: P:Travel.Common.EnvironmentLibrary.PageFolderPath
member.summary: CCC: Returns the folder of the current page e.g. '/MyWebSite/my_folder/'
